                                                                                <p>Stratechery, incredibly enough, has been my full-time job for over a decade; this is the 12th year-in-review. Here are the previous editions:</p>

<p>It has long been a useful clich√© to say that covering tech is easy, because something is always happening; now that that something is AI, that is more true than ever. Nearly every Article on Stratechery this year was about AI in some way or another, and that is likely to be true for years to come.</p>
<p><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/the-gen-ai-bridge-to-the-future/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fOVxs3LGx2axyu0NfWB3SpTjHBPNVce8AxNqV4GKQyI6kiKfUKOmVt3rKeb0jsBNuAacrk7ZxsF2u2yPswvK9VJuV5AMoleemOcp0BPRRAUErzTMxk8OIlC0dGpQabRgt27vbco0HZdMua0SQ5SL_zR8wqIITPSZbhkUROQJ_aPjCi1ImIK51MAHhz9Pdw6mDSya_78THw2Ld15mCP6Z7Cqo50yoG3VKGvlhWga6tOISDNg3oJnrsi5LhaHJJ2CSxC5qa_2qLV3PFD9IE4FhOd8lG3vp_HFZGeC90_M0Ykj2ZGRy_F-gxH7roth3Kd4bGzS4OENtfLnX_oUPq8kkeg"><img src="https://i0.wp.com/stratechery.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/generative-ai-bridge-9.png?resize=1024%2C353&amp;ssl=1"></a></p>

<h3>AI and the Future</h3>
<p>Looking ahead to how AI will change everything.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/enterprise-philosophy-and-the-first-wave-of-ai/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ilQqO7twMXnMebrrq4ZCYw-vSLoyxzDbVKhfQPC55Eskvoc6iW8AeZbR2v4WatqHyiTd2Vn4DsJdCs93MvhX8z5MEd5OkZzS-QnHYm36CImgJIh3TwYVpQaXdJvl9xnHsc6GJQhuuWDvE5WW8MnzFTGLw61AjdsRYdJ77duIUlftC_iC2Pcv39GfBHtKT5_MBbTPxPPH8mxmQ2qPm-KweHBQpHPgh2ltUfb6gQTlbuwrBXPRSETlPZDCKpZpVFExbwtxTzKILMazI0w2fzGiUmwbcbEGn-j8Q_wVA6fGaLOJvHG8UTZDNoFUb2Uj5gTCg0Um-3-H2douUgSk0AW4MQ">Enterprise Philosophy and The First Wave of AI</a> ‚Äî The first wave of successful AI implementations will probably look more like the first wave of computing, which was dominated by large-scale enterprise installations that eliminated jobs. <h3>Government and Regulation</h3>
<p>An emerging theme this year ‚Äî which <a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/rapidus-the-end-of-economic-rationality-ai-disruption/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..bmdrjlnruYVNZ_Duczt5nJgsmRNVKsyiBZWzwtoiTFRSka729IOCZTe0kdLOc7Nu-n1t5o1218wJT9EUvqb-1FCNWP9NF2Dr7qPR-tPuQQ1ioy-RWnkwG0aoPjUWVQeF8P36B0qdI4tbbp9lIyCzr6DFjkCgjk3Qnmnyn7H0j_6vKv3ysbTKWOpfrrdeJm5Xe_fLUcA9GnGLmR8WemPdkg8KR5-pBG1xqrpnLT_8VVng5jMA7Zn8vL1ZlNlahemJ83NGi4NqRBNZZlDUgOfD84MDf460j7LFmU9CflaoTpLUcCR-cg2s0ZOcz-k11LObEdStp29QjnVaaUKQtmoe3A">I expect to continue</a> alongside AI ‚Äî is the rising importance of non-economic factors in terms of technological development, even as regulators ramp up pressure on the giants of the Aggregator era.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/a-chance-to-build/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..awAOWWDIGmcifPym-v2AxQJBYYqCJscYQnAIP1ocqo-GL1lvl0x843kJWaciPJ5pMIIDcEyyuSAz4vkJ4k87jmN79TtK3qhJhLmqJHC8cXr8Kn_JlAuCxAkWjfkFUiGy--RycmUIMW7K7SlM9-N_qcw3Mug40D_QM7WuRFGI5fom39gaN8jV7x3Z-nS9KEMW-YX7oUtvMx6ssPg6xcT1u1bqCj_J774THs8YE8jj2YIUwOvTK0-FwryUCiZ1WMDmO87oekzQNT3xwTH3VvjF7K6h8qFMQ6RYv01vP-5G3posgQTcCWBJFiTP9PcYMt3sEik37Xh1a1e85Tb5jEP__w">A Chance to Build</a> ‚Äî Silicon Valley has always been deeply integrated with Asia; Trump‚Äôs attempt to change trade could hurt Silicon Valley more than expected, and also present opportunities to build something new. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rKj79A1D44"><em>YouTube</em></a></li>
<li><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/intels-death-and-potential-revival/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..aKynQmGmVSXISBLKvc5exD9hmhbhbIno3xQ703J_Y8N-4Fm7m22CXf9ourVKVgV2baE-eGGn_TFqXUGZB2foiRvRltidPG0pcA_L_hssE8J_TUyM4CzCZ-qTm_S4VQuTVAbDWZa83ptTpRwZ1ZRxt55FzUevhnM8E_A-jQgoMmPPxGET2yUVRIR9CZtLl3EM06a1ATGB75bcPG8yTOVUTMgEzkMseckn0ptC5WqXtxgP07dhK5J8Qyd6M4FHxeLuCzAiDluumAcEumfRlXtXmlgyCpD4PvPsjRRa9FeKVeQuYpRQE62T3--ZMbPJRHopZGKMjAOgoaFQ0_JJefJDDw">Intel‚Äôs Death and Potential Revival</a> ‚Äî Intel died when mobile cost it its software differentiation; if the U.S. wants a domestic foundry, then it ought to leverage the need for AI chips to make an independent Intel foundry viable. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HGPdfV7evFU"><em>YouTube</em></a></li>
<li><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/the-e-u-goes-too-far/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..FuxxLrXDIBVsec7dC8_15QZQSnzaa_gUi31yeDaMFKIDdsCTKvTditz0ALyrb6fQHA7yB5asAJKJh6GhZcLdYt_Zcs9vGhF-WgFUBJaj2mwqKeCJzbpowz8hk1F9XU-gV3atuxQq5Gb1MxcROQKWnPiekkOAAGoXx3xMFSNUdzmqgL8ffxRoHynKLgao7dDKV81JCpZg-Aj7hwt1-1fDNCwoD8L2a1s00jYsGY494TDL-vJx4CvGw3qVZBSfwcPYe7hipdtgp5Vz8owdlrL92OybCBI4x_UNJmbgtonjl9gy4XQBoJW6P18dd9WmJSGzOs1nfis7meSBkIPH4HouYA">The E.U. Goes Too Far</a> ‚Äî Recent E.U. regulatory decisions cross the line from market correction to property theft; if the E.U. continues down this path they are likely to see fewer new features and no new companies. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SSqAM8qb47g"><em>YouTube</em></a></li>
<li><a href="https://stratechery.com/2024/friendly-google-and-enemy-remedies/?access_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InN0cmF0ZWNoZXJ5LnBhc3Nwb3J0Lm9ubGluZSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..cHN8kgxHvZPSWAK2cbStsQgbKvdqp56NmZSQbvgHEr87vBxDvTsKJiSpwxZRJ9ux3nqcY73h5yAA1vHcyHge8Qvtkvx1gKVKceTbHhlaws4s7zZGVg4tbj96tXnP0Igdg1LsQO2EBFj2E7Rzm63fEDGGYRqYymgdH0EydnFOXWGan2ZLasro8ClrNSNceyfRYg6FVpnbVcCnACF98KP6QCuBZHc8NOW8qrB54qwPeL2w8AmeMxCmgJh6mgRdpOFmzPORN3NXDkd4ovx16ECIo2-qlxxfhtgDz6k4avXCkUH6aLvDuc6I2y5RrVcGuoVhBFa148mx6RrEZR93I-v1QQ">Friendly Google and Enemy Remedies</a> ‚Äî The DOJ brought the right kind of case against an Aggregator, which stagnates by being too nice; the goal is for companies to act like they actually have enemies. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FfAkw0EGISw"><em>YouTube</em></a></li>

Apple</a> ‚Äî Apple is being sued by the DOJ, but most of the complaints aren‚Äôt about the App Store. I think, though, Apple‚Äôs approach to the App Store is what led to this case.</li>
